prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Fully custom-designed WordPress site tailored to client branding.
Custom blog setup with 5 example posts.
excluded: Google Analytics, performance tracking, and speed optimization.
Training session for client to manage their site.

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Fully custom-designed WordPress site tailored to client branding.
Custom blog setup with 5 example posts.
Google Analytics, performance tracking, and speed optimization.
Training session for client to manage their site.

prices.name: Custom Plan
included: Fully custom-designed WordPress site tailored to client branding.
Custom blog setup with 5 example posts.
Google Analytics, performance tracking, and speed optimization.
Training session for client to manage their site.

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Basic video editing (cutting, trimming, and arranging footage).
Basic color correction and audio balancing.
Adding background music and sound syncing.
Up to 5 minutes of final edited video.

prices.name: Advanced Plan
included: Custom text animation and motion graphics.
Professional sound design and music synchronization.
Up to 10 minutes of final edited video.

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Custom 3D animations and advanced visual effects.
Up to 20 minutes of final edited video.
Priority support and expedited delivery (3-5 days).

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Design of 2-3 simple graphics (e.g., social media posts, posters).
Use of stock images and basic typography.
File delivery in PNG and JPG formats.
One color scheme provided by the client.

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Design of 5-7 graphics (e.g., banners, flyers, or social media posts).
Custom typography and color palette tailored to your brand.
File delivery in PNG, JPG, and PDF formats.
excluded: Editable source files (AI, PSD) for all designs.
Multiple design concepts for each graphic.

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Design of 10-15 graphics (e.g., complete campaign materials or branding assets).
Custom illustrations and advanced design elements.
Editable source files (AI, PSD) for all graphics.
Delivery in multiple formats (PNG, JPG, PDF, EPS).
Comprehensive brand style guide (logo, color palette, typography).

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Development of a simple Django application with up to 5 pages
Integration of one database (PostgreSQL or MySQL)
Deployment on a single server (Heroku or VPS)
Bug fixes and support for 2 weeks
REST API integration for up to 3 endpoints
excluded: Integration of third-party services or advanced APIs.
Ongoing support or maintenance after deployment.

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Development of a simple Django application with up to 5 pages
Integration of one database (PostgreSQL or MySQL)
Deployment on a single server (Heroku or VPS)
Bug fixes and support for 2 weeks
REST API integration for up to 3 endpoints
excluded: Advanced integrations (e.g., payment gateways, external APIs).

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Development of a mid-level Django application with up to 15 pages
Integration of multiple databases or cloud storage
Custom API development with up to 10 endpoints
Frontend integration with React or Angular
Testing and QA for all features
Email notifications or third-party service integration

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Development of a simple MERN web application with up to 3 pages
Backend API with up to 3 endpoints
Deployment on a single server (Heroku or VPS)
Bug fixes and support for 2 weeks

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Development of a simple MERN web application with up to 5 pages
Backend API with up to 5 endpoints
Deployment on a single server (Heroku or VPS)
Bug fixes and support for 1 month

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Development of a simple MERN web application with up to 7 pages
Backend API with up to 7 endpoints
Deployment on a single server (Heroku or VPS)
Bug fixes and support for 3 month

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Development of a simple mobile app with up to 3 screens
Support for a single platform (iOS or Android)
Database integration with up to 3 tables
Bug fixes and support for 2 weeks
Basic analytics setup (Google Analytics or similar)

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Development of a mobile app with up to 5 screens
Support for a single platform (iOS or Android)
Database integration with up to 5 tables
Push notifications for up to 1 user group
Deployment to a single app store
Bug fixes and support for 2 weeks
Basic analytics setup (Google Analytics or similar)

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Development of a full-featured mobile app with unlimited screens.
Advanced UI/UX design with custom animations and transitions.
Integration with backend APIs and third-party services.
Role-based user authentication and advanced security measures.
Push notifications, real-time updates, and offline capabilities.
Ongoing maintenance and support for 2 months post-launch.

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Basic keyword research and optimization for up to 5 pages.
On-page SEO: meta titles, descriptions, and basic schema setup.
Google Search Console and Analytics setup.
excluded: Content creation or blog post optimization.
Advanced technical SEO (e.g., fixing crawl errors, redirects).

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Comprehensive keyword research for up to 10 pages.
On-page SEO: meta tags, alt text, and schema markup.
Content optimization for existing blog posts or pages.
Competitor analysis and SEO strategy recommendations.
Basic backlink building (up to 5 links per month).
excluded: Extensive content creation (e.g., writing new blogs or articles).

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Advanced keyword research covering the entire site.
Full technical SEO audit with implementation (e.g., fixing crawl issues, XML sitemap optimization).
Content creation: 2 SEO-optimized blogs/articles per month.
Comprehensive competitor analysis and ongoing updates.
Advanced backlink building strategy (10 links per month).
Local SEO setup and optimization (Google My Business).
Monthly performance tracking, reporting, and strategy adjustments.

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Setup of a simple WordPress or Shopify website with up to 5 pages.
Installation of a free or basic theme and essential plugins.
Basic customization to match client branding.
Integration of contact forms and social media links.

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Creation of a WordPress or Shopify website with up to 10 pages.
Installation of premium themes and plugins (licensed by client).
E-commerce setup with up to 20 products.
Integration of contact forms, live chat, and social media links.
excluded: Content creation or blog post setup.

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Advanced WordPress or Shopify store with unlimited pages.
Custom theme development and advanced plugin integration.
Full e-commerce setup with up to 50 products uploaded.
SEO optimization, including keyword research and meta tagging.
Payment gateway integration and advanced shipping options.
Custom features like memberships, bookings, or subscriptions.

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Short motion graphic video up to 30 seconds.
Inclusion of provided text, logos, and images.
excluded: Additional revisions beyond the included round.

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Motion graphic video up to 1 minute.
Custom storyboard creation based on client input.
Sound design and royalty-free music integration.
excluded: Multiple voiceovers or complex sound mixing.

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Motion graphic video up to 2 minutes.
Advanced animations, including character movement and 3D elements.
Sound effects and professional sound mixing.
High resolution (4K) with multiple format exports.

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Writing up to 1,500 words (e.g., blog posts, product descriptions).
Research on a single topic or niche.
excluded: Extensive research for technical or niche subjects.
Multiple drafts for different tones or styles.
Writing for highly regulated industries (e.g., legal, medical).

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Writing up to 5,000 words (e.g., website copy, detailed guides).
SEO optimization with detailed keyword research.
excluded: Extensive competitor analysis or content strategy development.
Writing for highly specialized or regulated industries.

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Writing up to 10,000 words (e.g., whitepapers, sales funnels, eBooks).
Comprehensive topic research and competitor analysis.
SEO optimization with content strategy development.
excluded: Additional services like designing or multimedia integration.

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Ad campaign setup on one platform (Google Ads, Facebook, or Instagram).
Keyword research and ad copy creation.
Basic reporting and analytics (once per month).
excluded: A/B testing for ad performance optimization.
Video ad creation or complex creatives.
Ad spend (client must provide a separate budget).

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Ad campaign setup on two platforms (Google Ads, Facebook, or Instagram).
Advanced keyword research and ad copy creation.
Monthly ad budget recommendation and adjustment.
excluded: Video ad creation or advanced interactive ads.
Ad spend (client must provide a separate budget).

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Ad campaign setup on up to three platforms (Google, Facebook, Instagram, or LinkedIn).
Custom ad strategies tailored to business goals.
A/B testing to optimize ad performance.
Video ad creation and carousel ads.
Monthly strategy consultation with optimization tips.
excluded: Ad spend (client must provide a separate budget).
